Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Indoor \In"door`\, a. Done or being within doors; within a house or institution; domestic; as, indoor work. [1913 Webster]

indoor adj 1: located, suited for, or taking place within a building; "indoor activities for a rainy day"; "an indoor pool" [syn: {indoor(a)}, {inside}] [ant: {outdoor(a)}] 2: within doors; "an indoor setting"
